title: please suggest some headphones
selftext:
​

[want headphones for casual use](https://preview.redd.it/1nd2v6pduigb1.png?width=690&format=png&auto=webp&s=bec385033be924205b59c37aae3fb3320d01bfbe)

 

just want crisp sound/vocals , for casual use only , no music or gaming ,want comfortable and nice audio

wired,wireless or hybrid

budget upto 3500
